description: An all-day pant that offers a unique combination of performance and style. Backpacker gave the AP Pant its Editor's Choice Award for incomparable fit, design, and versatility. Made from a blended canvas fabric it's comfortable, durable, and has excellent stretch.
name: Mountain Hardwear Hardwear AP Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Stretch Cotton Nylon Sanded Canvas (75% Cotton, 23% Nylon, 2% Elastane)
